subject: AI & Agents
title: Content-Based Filtering: Know the Item
description: One-minute skill: Content-Based Filtering: Know the Item.

hook.text: You loved three sci-fi thrillers. Here's another sci-fi thriller. Content-based filtering.

buildup.text: Content-based methods represent items by their features: genre, tags, text, images.

discovery.text: Build a user profile from the features of items they liked. Match new items to that profile.

twist.text: No cold start for items: if you know the features, you can recommend it immediately.

climax.text: Limitation: content-based stays in the user's comfort zone. No serendipitous discoveries.

punchline.text: Know the items. Match the user. Stay in the lane.

quiz.question: What is a limitation of content-based filtering?
options: It stays in the user's comfort zone with no surprises
